Articles.Content:
I've logged about 400 hours in KSP and have always enjoyed reading the forum. Figured I may as well dive in and give something back.

Thanks everyone!

Welcome Jonboy. No longer lurking. How does your program go?

:^)

Goodnight Mary Anne.
It's great. Right now I'm working on Death Engineering's Constellation Space Program Challenge. Looking forward to lots more challenges in the future.
